content: the half_double_crochet join and 1hdc into the top of the beg ch2 to complete the last corner per side 31hdc per corner 2hdc ch2 2hdc round 12 ch3 this counts as your 1st double_crochet 1dc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *ch1 skip the 1st hidden st 1dc in the next st ch1 skip st 1dc in the next st 16 times ch1 skip the last st 2dc ch2 2dc in the chain-2 corner space* repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2dc ch2 2dc 2dc into the space created by the half_double_crochet join and 1hdc into the top of the beg chain to complete the last corner per side 17dc 18 chain-1 sps per corner 2dc ch2 2dc round 13 ch3 this counts as your 1st double_crochet 1dc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *skip the 1st hidden st 1 double_crochet in the next st 2dc in each of the next 18 chain- 1 sps 1dc in the next st skip the last st 2dc ch2 2dc in the chain-2 corner space* repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2dc ch2 2dc 2dc into the space created by the half_double_crochet join ch2 fasten_off with an invisible join alternatively ch2 and slip_stitch into the top of the beg ch3 and fasten off per side 38dc per corner 2dc 2ch 2dc 7 i hope you have had as much fun making atalia s star as i have had creating her a very special thank you to kim lategan monika mackenzie roxan zumani and the admin testers and translators from the friends around the world cal for your input into this design best wishes kogi naidoo copyright 2016 kogi naidoo please do not post this pattern on the internet even if it was obtained as a free pattern post the link to my ravelry store where you can see all my patterns http //www ravelry com/designers/kogi-naidoo or the link to my website https //www creativekogi com/ contact me via e-mail at koginaidoodesigns@gmail com 8
